channel.title: (317) Boss Scape 2.1 - D claws/Custom places/+MUCH MORE! [1k+ downloads]
channel.description:
----Some features in V2 (317)---- Full Godsword specials Barrelchest anchor stance and hitting 474 rune defender 474 whip attack emote Custom quest "Save Santa" Dragon Claws Custom items Some Mini-Games Sweet skilling area Some PKing spots (type ::pk for the 3 portals) Full slayer tower - Just like runescape with the monsters! PvP Armor (Statius,Zuriels, and Morrigans) (Something went wrong with vesta and now its just a null..)
(Client) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?smu5m9php9mrgrh]http://www.mediafire.com/?smu5m9php9mrgrh[/url] (Source) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?t733d9was7mu3mv]http://www.mediafire.com/?t733d9was7mu3mv[/url]
----Some Features in V2.1 (317)---- (Everything is the same as V2 except I added new areas and drops and fixed up some things) >>>>NEW AREA<<<< Dragons - Has dragons [color=green]Green[/color] - [color=black]Black[/color] >>>>NEW AREA<<<< PvP - Has NPC's (5 of them) that drop pvp armor. (They attack with a ice barrage and hit low) >>>>NEW MODEL<<<< The dharoks greataxe is the newer rs model with the new attack styles >>>>NEW AREA<<<< Custom Assault - I completely remodeled assault and it has new npc's and a completely new area.. Instead of points I made it so that the npcs will drop the item such as a fighter torso or rune defender and ashes. >>>>REMOVED CUSTOMS<<<< Only because people hated them.. If it were just me I probally would of kept them but I had to let them go. >>>>FIXED UP STAFFZONE A LITTLE BIT<<<< I changed what you get from the chest since no customs.
(Source) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/x6qvr8s850td5ko/Boss%20Source.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/file/x6qvr8s850td5ko/Boss%20Source.rar[/url] (Client) You can use the previous 2.0 client nothing client-sided was changed
----Some features in V2.2 (317)----Work in progress [color=maron]Corrected item bonuses New home Removed customs Decompiled class8.java and class5.java so you guys can add npc's and items if you'd like to New shops Added full dismantle option on the godsword. Adds the godsword blade and the mantle of it. Added a hand cannon.. (item id is 6082)(No credits to me I just followed a guide on that :P) Fixed the shops glitch where it would take tokkul and crap and screwed up the shopping Added a folder called "Tools" It was originally Zodiacs but I just renamed it so it's more convient.. 100% credits go to Z O D I A C for those sweet tools.. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2vb4ef9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/351dfd3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/a2auk4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1060a3p.jpg[/img] [size=14[color=orange[/color]pt]V2.0[/size] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10p99o4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/28jb6o1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/303elgj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2hpp1ld.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/zt7in9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/r9n909.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/vgkl0o.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/in8z1x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/20f6f78.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/ofdm42.jpg[/img] [size=14pt]V2.1[/size]
---Credits--- Locksmin - 30% for source Mopar People who answer questions - 10% Me - 60% for coding pretty much the whole thing

item.title: (317) Boss Scape 2.1 - D claws/Custom places/+MUCH MORE! [1k+ downloads]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

It’s not unique. This source is just like any other 317 you would pickup from the server downloads section.
However, you put effort into it. What I don’t like about your effort is that you aren’t combining your creativity with your effort.

Make a new source, something that is different from the rest. Something like a whole new minigame (you did make a minigame, however, it’s not going to go anywhere. It doesn’t seem very creative to me). Something like new random events. Something that would want people to download this source and take it in as their new server. You put effort into this, but not creativity. I see you got the will to make a source but you need to be creative of what you are going to add. You are growing an apple tree that has been grown 50+ times by others. Try growing a banana tree next time.

  • 6/10

Read full topic
